allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Flutter mobile app with parcel operations and payment integration

- Implement courier dashboard with parcel status tabs \(Sent, Loaded, Offloaded, Received, Issued\)
- Add parcel operations: load, offload, receive, issue with confirmation dialogs
- Integrate M-Pesa and Family Bank STK Push payment processing
- Add login screen supporting email, phone, or username authentication
- Update backend AuthController to accept flexible login credentials
- Add test credentials seeder with proper Active status
- Include parcel, payment, and station services with API integration

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add user registration API endpoint and test credentials seeder

- Add register\(\) method to AuthController for new user signup
- Add public POST /api/v1/auth/register route
- Update login to accept email, phone number, or username
- Add TestCredentialsSeeder with test users for all roles

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
